originalText.text: Dr. Fusaro is very patient, listens and treat accordingly. He is the only doctor that was able to help me with my neck and shoulder issues. Very knowledgeable, friendly and utilizes excellent chiropractic techniques. Makes me feel very comfortable.

originalText.text: Dr Fusaro the best chiropractor in New York! I have a lot of issues with my spine, after just a couple of sessions with Dr Fusaro I feel like newborn!Please don’t waste your time looking for a “good” doctor- come straight to his office and you will never regret!The front desk girl Jackie very helpful and friendly!

originalText.text: I’m under severe pain in the lower back and constant pain in neck and shoulders. It’s the second time I went there. In 2019 he had a very good massage and acupuncture person. Now there was no staff, no treatment for your health issues. No hygiene at all, as he never uses gloves and touches deferent people at the same time. The only thing he knows to do well is to charge your insurance card.

originalText.text:
I had lower back pain for a while and after just Ignoring it for a months I decided to get it checked out. I felt so much better after just the first visit and by the 7th visit I felt 90% better.
Dr. Gerard is a great chiropractor and person and I’m telling all my family and friends to go to this place!

originalText.text: I visited the 49st location “ I was in pain of many parts  of my body and I was able to get help “ my knees was always giving me problem and sleeping  insomnia after getting Accupuncture I Am able to see results thank you Dr. Fasuro and team
